description:
Ushimitsu Kozo the great thief who robbed from the rich and gave to the poor gets caught and his true identity stuns Orochi and the others. When Toko hears the news, she gets very upset and so is Zoro when he hears the reason.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hohe Wellen werden geschlagen - Die Identität des edlen Diebes Kozo Ushimitsu
La rumeur se répand. L`identité du voleur au grand cœur !
Shaking the Nation! The Identity of Ushimitsu Kozo the Chivalrous Thief!
Shougeki Hashiru: Gizoku Ushimitsu Kozou no Shoutai
Народ в шоке! Личность вора-рыцаря Ушимитсу Кодзо!
衝撃走る 義賊丑三つ小僧の正体
